p:
Low quality cells were identified based on the distribution of total reads and number of genes detected per cell (
Figure S1 ). Cells with fewer than 500 genes per cell and 10,000 reads per cell were removed. Additionally, cells with greater than 3,000 genes per cell were removed from the Pb single-gut data set. Transcriptomes were normalized by calculating the base 2 logarithm of the counts per million (CPM) for each cell.
